quote: And just so you know from the Secret Service, there aren't too many people outside protesting, OK. That I can tell you.
quotePlain: And just so you know from the Secret Service, there aren’t too many people outside protesting, OK. That I can tell you.
name: Donald Trump

checks.quote: Thousands of people were out on the streets of Phoenix protesting Trump’s speech, according to multiple media accounts and the Phoenix police chief, who said the city’s downtown had "tens of thousands" of people exercising their right to free speech.
checks.quotePlain: Thousands of people were out on the streets of Phoenix protesting Trump’s speech, according to multiple media accounts and the Phoenix police chief, who said the city’s downtown had “tens of thousands” of people exercising their right to free speech.

checks.quote: Those protesters numbered in the "thousands," as [Fox News](http://www.foxnews.com/politics/2017/08/22/thousands-protesters-flock-to-trump-speech-in-phoenix.html) and the [Los Angeles Times](http://www.latimes.com/politics/la-na-pol-trump-protesters-20170822-story.html) reported.
checks.quotePlain: Those protesters numbered in the “thousands,” as Fox News and the Los Angeles Times reported.

claims.title: there were few protesters at 2017 Trump rally in Phoenix
claims.negative: there were many protesters at 2017 Trump rally in Phoenix
claims.negativePlain: there were many protesters at 2017 Trump rally in Phoenix
